name: B.E.A.S.T.S.
description:
B.E.A.S.T.S. is a 2-player game that combines the city destroyer genre with the city building genre!

In B.E.A.S.T.S. your aim is to become mayor of the city by building up as many towers as you can before your opponent. Break Everything And Stack Towering Structures to create your own city!

  • Destroy buildings for parts and stack them to gain city points. Taller structures score more points.
  • Destroy or capture your opponent's buildings to make them lose points.
  • Upgrade buildings by placing roofs on them. Upgraded buildings give double city points and have 3x health!
  • Whoever has the most city points at the end of the round becomes mayor! 

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 41 Jam. The theme was "Combine 2 incompatible genres". 

Controls
  • Keyboard:
    • Player1:
      • Movement - WASD
      • Jump - 1
      • Action - 2
    • Player2:
      • Movement - Arrows
      • Jump - Comma
      • Action - Period
    • General
      • Action button attacks or picks up building pieces
      • Hold the action button to charge a special attack or throw when holding a building piece
      • Double tap a direction to sprint
      • Controls can be reassigned in game
